casebody.data:
No. D-2539. In the Matter of Discipline of Leonard Udell Stolar. 562 U.S. 814, 131 S. Ct. 405,

178 L. Ed. 2d 269,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7644. October 4, 2010.

Leonard Udell Stolar, of Miami, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, re*270quiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
